column1: Effectiveness of head coach's leadership and direction for the team
Effectiveness of head coach's communication skills
Effectiveness of assistant coach's communication skills
Effectiveness of student-athlete leadership within your team
Confidence in the quality of care provided to you by your Athletic Trainer
Extent to which your Athletic Trainer understood sport specific needs and demands
Appropriate monitoring and individual assistance by strength and conditioning staff
Extent to which the strength and conditioning program that was provided prepared you for the demands of your sport
Accessibility, knowledge, and quality of resources provided by Student-Athlete Support Services (academic counseling, tutoring, graduate course exploration)

Accessibility, effectiveness, and knowledge of student-athlete development workshops and events (eg. Athlete Ally, BFLA, community service, SAAC, Student-Athletes of Color, Terrier Network Career Development, etc.)
Quality and quantity of necessary apparel and equipment provided for your sport
Adequate attention to safety while traveling for or engaging in practice and competition
Effectiveness of communication about COVID-19 protocols, changes, and implementation of those measures
Accessibility and effectiveness of athletics administrators to answer questions or address student-athlete concerns
Accepting, welcoming environment for diversity provided within the BU athletics community
Similar performance expectations, behavioral standards and support provided compared to your male/female counterparts
Ability to successfully manage time demands and achieve appropriate balance between academics, athletics, and community and social experiences
Extent to which your coaches emphasized the importance of academic achievement as well as involvement within the athletic department
Overall experience
Winning Percentage
League Finish
League Champion
*Student-athlete annual surveys are distributed at the conclusion of each season (includes Winter 2020-21, Fall/Spring 2021)
*Surveys are based on a 1 to 4 ascending scale (1=Worst, 4=Best)
*Average team score of 3.75 or higher is noted in green
*Average team score of 2.75 or lower is noted in red
